title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Rachel Adedeji keen for Lisa and Cleo romance
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

It’s no secret that Hollyoaks character Lisa Loveday is unlucky in love when it comes to romancing the men in the village. But actress Rachel Adedeji is hoping that will all change next year because she wants Lisa to fall in love with her bezzie mate Cleo McQueen (Nadine Mulkerrin).

Clea? Liso? Lio? There’s already a wealth of opportunity for their couple name and no doubt a loyal fanbase will be ready and waiting in no time.

Speaking exclusively to Metro.co.uk on the red carpet at last night’s Inside Soap Awards where Hollyoaks won Best Soap, Rachel confessed her dreams for the would-be ultimate pairing.

‘I’ve always been saying I want to be with Cleo not only because she’s my best mate in real life, but because she’s also been unlucky in love,’ Rachel told us.

‘How funny would that be? Lisa and Cleo!’

But if the writers don’t bring the two together Rachel admitted that she’s not fussed on who Lisa gets with.

‘I’m hoping 2020 can bring her a great person to settle down with,’ she enthused. ‘I mean, she’s not being picky. Anyone, really anyone. Anyone who can accept her as the nutter that she is. ‘

Rachel Adedeji is hoping that 2020 will be a better year for Lisa Loveday (Picture: PA Wire)

On top of that, Rachel teased there’s plenty of drama on the horizon for Lisa in the run-up to Christmas.

‘We’re shooting stuff for Christmas now and it’s been great because she’s all about having great fun, so you can see in a few of the Christmas episodes she’s all about having a laugh and spending time with her family.

‘Of course she’s lost her dad and she will not let whoever did it get away with murder. Obviously we know it was Breda, but Lisa is yet to find out and of course once she finds out, it’s not going to go down well.’
